alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 2:43AM CST until February 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing snow is possible in some locations. Occasional visibility reductions are possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
